titles.title: Historical Record Exemption Act of 2018

To authorize the Secretary of a military department to correct a military record at the request of an interested party more than 175 years after the date of the creation of the military record, and for other purposes.
Historical Record Exemption Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary:
Historical Record Exemption Act of 2018
This bill authorizes a military department to correct a military record that was created more than 175 years ago if the request comes from a person with a vested interest in the record.
